TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Menu/DropDown extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for the drop-down arrow of a menu. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Menu.DropDown.Normal%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Menu.DropDown> class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the drop-down arrow of a menu.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Menu.DropDown.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementMenuDropDown1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#196](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#196)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#196](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#196)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the drop-down arrow of a menu.
Docs.value: A that represents the drop-down arrow of a menu.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Menu.DropDown.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Menu.DropDown.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementMenuDropDown1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#196](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#196)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#196](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#196)]
